meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Milton John Oliver Bundy Todd Giese Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7270.

div.div: Ten April Fools' Easter eggs edited into the show.

td.p: Milton John, a physical therapist from Nanuet, New York
Oliver Bundy, an attorney originally from Anchorage, Alaska
Todd Giese, a hotel front desk manager from New Orleans, Louisiana (whose 3-day cash winnings total $74,402)

tr.td: DAVID MUIR COVERS POLITICS
THE "-PHILE" FILE
CAST OF THE TV SHOW
(Alex: You identify the show for us.)
TRAVEL USA
TUBA
TOOTHPASTE

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Syria

Todd
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Todd
Oliver
Milton?

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Todd
Oliver
Milton?
LITERARY LATIN AMERICA
ROCKS & MINERALS
OSCARS
BACKSTAGE AT THE THEATRE
ON THE OLD MAP OF EUROPE
WORDS OF SUBSTANCE
(Alex: The word "substance" has nine letters. Each correct response will be made up of some of the letters in the word "substance".)
